activities: Arc Worldwide, Inc.  receives consumer data from its clients, as determined by its clients, and  processes such data at the direction of its clients, operating  solely as a data processor on behalf of its clients. Consumer data may be processed for a variety of purposes specified by its clients including responding to inquiries, sending marketing communications, and understanding consumer interest in clients’ products  in order to obtain information for its clients including:  1) permission for future communications; 2) product preferences; 3) marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; 4) contact preferences; and 5) consumer support activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The ArcLight system processes data online, offline and data that is manually processed.
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework; TRUSTe
